caption: Connect
doc: An action to initialize a connection. It will trigger "Connection Deep Link Generated" when called

AAU.caption: Wallet Provider
AAU.doc: Wallet provider by it's name. Get all available wallets in the state called "Wallet Providers"
AAU.name: wallet_provider

AAZ.caption: To connect to a custom wallet provider, introduce it's universal link and bridge link to initiate a custom connection
AAZ.name: info

ABe.caption: OR - Connect to a Custom Provider (Optional)
ABe.name: info2
